Abstract .This paper introduces cost curves , a graphical technique for visualizing the performance ( error rate or expected cost ) of 2-class classifiers over the full range of possible class distributions and misclassification costs .Cost curves are shown to be superior to ROC curves for visualizing classifier performance for most purposes .
